I would suggest when taking the metformin to take it with a meal.  Hopefully that will make you not as nauseas.  It does take your body a while to get used to the medication.

Metformin worked great for me especially taking it while on a low carb diet.  I had poor eggs, which resulted in 2 miscarriages but after taking Metformin and following low carb diet (whole wheat grain, fruit, veggies, etc) during an IVF cycle really helped me get pregnant.  Your body will get use to the medication once your on a steady dose and like kaprovea said take it with a meal.  Good luck with everything.
